request.description:
**This API is used for OTP creation. User can create OTP using Mobile.**
Field Validtions Remarks
mobile string() Should be mobile required
type string.valid("FP", "UU").required() Mandatory field. Value can be FP -> Forgot password OR UU -> Update user
hashKey string()
countryCode string()

Response Codes

Response Code Description
200 Success
400 Bad Request
401 Unauthorized
403 Forbidden
500 Internal Server Error

**This API is used for OTP verificaiton. User can verify OTP against Email**
Field Validtions Remarks
mobile string.() Should be mobile required
otp number().minValue(1000).max(9999).required
type string.valid("FP", "UU").required() Mandatory field. Value can be FP -> Forgot password OR UU -> Update user


Response Codes

Response Code Description
200 Success
400 Bad Request
401 Unauthorized
403 Forbidden
500 Internal Server Error

**This API is used for OTP verificaiton. User can verify OTP against Email**
Field Validtions Remarks
mobile string.() Should be mobile required
otp number().minValue(1000).max(9999).required
type string.valid("FP", "UU").required() Mandatory field. Value can be FP -> Forgot password OR UU -> Update user


Response Codes

Response Code Description
200 Success
400 Bad Request
401 Unauthorized
403 Forbidden
500 Internal Server Error

This API is to signUp new user.
Request Parameters
Field Validtions Remarks
authType string.minLength(1).maxLenght(20).required Value could be 'app' or 'web'. For this api always use "app"
firstName string.minLength(15).maxLength(100) firstName of user
lastName string.minLength(15).maxLength(100) firstName of user
email string.minLength(5).maxLength(255) Email of user
mobile string.().required() mobile of user
deviceToken string.minLength(1).maxLength(100) Shall be required at time of registration.
referralCode string()
countryCode string()
referralCode string()


Response Codes
Response Code Description
200 Success
400 Bad Request
401 Unauthorized
403 Forbidden
500 Internal Server Error

This API is to update the existing user.
Request Parameters
Field Validtions Remarks
firstName string.minLength(15).maxLength(100) firstName of user
lastName string.minLength(15).maxLength(100) lastName of user
email string.minLength(5).maxLength(255).required() Email of user
mobile string.().required() mobile of user
profilePic string.minLength(1).maxLength(255)
deviceToken string.minLength(1).maxLength(100)
otpToken number


Response Codes
Response Code Description
200 Success
400 Bad Request
401 Unauthorized
403 Forbidden
500 Internal Server Error

**This API can be used by user to change the existing password.**
Field Validtions Remarks
oldPassword string.minLength(5).maxLenght(255).required
newPassword string.minLength(5).maxLenght(255).required

Response Codes

Response Code Description
200 Success
400 Bad Request
401 Unauthorized
403 Forbidden
500 Internal Server Error

admin will create the vendor with this api:</br>
   name: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    email: Joi.string().lowercase().min(6).max(255).required().email(),</br>
    password: Joi.string().min(4).max(255).required(),</br>
    mobile: Joi.string().min(7).max(14).required(),</br>
    merchantCategory: Joi.string().valid("restaurant", "grocery", "liquor"),</br>
    location: Joi.array(),</br>
    address: Joi.string(),</br>
    city: Joi.string(),</br>
    cityId: Joi.objectId().required(),</br>
    platformFeePercentage: Joi.number(),</br>
    vatCharge: Joi.number(),</br>
    serviceTax: Joi.number(),</br>
    serviceCharge: Joi.number(),</br>
    deliveryRadius: Joi.number().required(),</br>
    profilePic: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    isPlatformFee: Joi.boolean(),</br>
    isDeliveryRadius: Joi.boolean(),</br>

vendor will add and update bank account details in this api:</br> 
password: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    isPaymentGatewayIntegrated: Joi.boolean().required(),</br>
    accountBank: Joi.when("isPaymentGatewayIntegrated", {
      is: false,
      then: Joi.string().required(),
      otherwise: Joi.string(),
    }),</br>
    accountNumber: Joi.when("isPaymentGatewayIntegrated", {
      is: false,
      then: Joi.string().required(),
      otherwise: Joi.string().required(),
    }),</br>
    countryAbbrevation: Joi.when("isPaymentGatewayIntegrated", {
      is: false,
      then: Joi.string().required(),
      otherwise: Joi.string(),
    }),</br>
    name: Joi.string(),</br>
    email: Joi.string(),</br>
    mobile: Joi.string(),</br>
    metaData: Joi.array(),</br>

Add subaccount for drivers:</br>
accountBank: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    accountNumber: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    countryAbbrevation: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    name: Joi.string(),</br>
    email: Joi.string(),</br>
    mobile: Joi.string(),</br>
    metaData: Joi.array(),</br>

name: Joi.string().required(),</br>

    mobile: Joi.string().min(10).max(13).required(),</br>

    location: Joi.array(),</br>
    address: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    city: Joi.string().required(),</br>

   openingTime: Joi.String().required(),</br>
   closingTime: Joi.String().required(),</br>
    day: Joi.Number().required(),</br>

vendor can update slots using this api:</br>
   
slotId: Joi.objectId().required(),</br>
    openingTime: Joi.string(),</br>
    closingTime: Joi.string(),</br>
    day: Joi.number()</br>

request.description:
subCategoryName: Joi.string().min(2).max(50).required(),</br>
    categoryId: Joi.string().required(),</br>

subCategoryName: Joi.string().min(2).max(50),
    subCategoryId: Joi.string().required(),

productId: Joi.objectId(),</br>
    title: Joi.string(),</br>
    price: Joi.number(),</br>
    oldPrice: Joi.string(),</br>
    description: Joi.string(),</br>
    category: Joi.string(),</br>
    subCategory: Joi.string(),</br>
    coverImage: Joi.string(),</br>
    offerText: Joi.string(),</br>
    calories: Joi.string(),</br>

vendor will create this project using this api:</br>
title: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    price: Joi.string(),</br>
    oldPrice: Joi.string(),</br>
    description: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    category: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    subCategory: Joi.string(),</br>
    coverImage: Joi.string(),</br>
    offerText: Joi.string(),</br>
    calories: Joi.string(),</br>

toppingId: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    toppingName: Joi.string(),</br>
    lowerLimit: Joi.number(),</br>
    upperLimit: Joi.number(),</br>
    checkbox: Joi.boolean(),</br>
    subtype: Joi.array().items(</br>
      Joi.object({</br>
        name: Joi.string(),</br>
        price: Joi.number(),</br>
      })</br>
    ),
  })

vendor will add topping to a product through this api:</br>
productId: Joi.objectId().required(),</br>
    toppings: Joi.array().items(
      Joi.object({</br>
        toppingName: Joi.string().required(),</br>
        lowerLimit: Joi.number(),</br>
        upperLimit: Joi.number(),</br>
        checkbox: Joi.boolean(),</br>
        subtype: Joi.array().items(
          Joi.object({</br>
            name: Joi.string(),</br>
            price: Joi.number(),</br>
          })</br>
        ),
      })
    ),

This API is to update coupon and promocode.
Request Parameters
Field Validtions Remarks
couponId string().required
description string()
couponStartTime number()
couponEndTime number()
perUserLimit number() per user limit
maxRedemption number()
status string()


Response Codes
Response Code Description
200 Success
400 Bad Request
401 Unauthorized
403 Forbidden
500 Internal Server Error

This API is to create coupon and promocode.
Request Parameters
Field Validtions Remarks
code string().required
description string().required
couponStartTime number().required
couponEndTime number().required
perUserLimit number().required per user limit
couponType string().required Value could be 'percentage' or 'fixed'.
type string().required Value could be 'coupon' or 'promocode',influencerCode.
value number().required
maxRedemption number().required
userId string().required


Response Codes
Response Code Description
200 Success
400 Bad Request
401 Unauthorized
403 Forbidden
500 Internal Server Error

orderId: Joi.objectId().required(),</br>
orderStatus:Joi.string().valid("ACCEPTED", "REJECTED"),</br>

details: Joi.object({
senderName: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderMobile: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderEmail: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderCountryCode: Joi.string().required(),</br>
  recipientName: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      recipientMobile: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      recipientEmail: Joi.string(),</br>
      recipientCountryCode: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      itemPicture: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      pickUpLoction: Joi.array().required(),</br>
      pickUpAddress: Joi.object().required(),</br>
      dropLoction: Joi.array().required(),</br>
      dropAddress: Joi.object().required(),</br>
      deliveryTime: Joi.number(),</br>
      deliveryDateTime: Joi.string(),</br>
      otherDeliveryDetails: Joi.object(),</br>
    }),
    paymentType: Joi.string().valid(["POD", "paidOnline", "card"]).required(),</br>
    cardToken: Joi.when("paymentType", {
      is: "card",
      then: Joi.string().required(),
      otherwise: Joi.string(),
    }),</br>
    taxes: Joi.object().required(),</br>
    taxesPercent: Joi.object().required(),</br>
    deliveryCharges: Joi.number().required(),</br>
    driverAmount: Joi.number(),</br>
    deliveryInstructions: Joi.string().allow(""),
    cardDetails: Joi.object(),</br>

details: Joi.object({
senderName: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderMobile: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderEmail: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderCountryCode: Joi.string().required(),</br>
  recipientName: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      recipientMobile: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      recipientEmail: Joi.string(),</br>
      recipientCountryCode: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      itemPicture: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      pickUpLoction: Joi.array().required(),</br>
      pickUpAddress: Joi.object().required(),</br>
      dropLoction: Joi.array().required(),</br>
      dropAddress: Joi.object().required(),</br>
      deliveryTime: Joi.number(),</br>
      deliveryDateTime: Joi.string(),</br>
      otherDeliveryDetails: Joi.object(),</br>
    }),
    paymentType: Joi.string().valid(["POD", "paidOnline", "card"]).required(),</br>
    cardToken: Joi.when("paymentType", {
      is: "card",
      then: Joi.string().required(),
      otherwise: Joi.string(),
    }),</br>
    taxes: Joi.object().required(),</br>
    taxesPercent: Joi.object().required(),</br>
    deliveryCharges: Joi.number().required(),</br>
    driverAmount: Joi.number(),</br>
    deliveryInstructions: Joi.string().allow(""),
    cardDetails: Joi.object(),</br>

details: Joi.object({
senderName: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderMobile: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderEmail: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderCountryCode: Joi.string().required(),</br>
  recipientName: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      recipientMobile: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      recipientEmail: Joi.string(),</br>
      recipientCountryCode: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      itemPicture: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      pickUpLoction: Joi.array().required(),</br>
      pickUpAddress: Joi.object().required(),</br>
      dropLoction: Joi.array().required(),</br>
      dropAddress: Joi.object().required(),</br>
      deliveryTime: Joi.number(),</br>
      deliveryDateTime: Joi.string(),</br>
      otherDeliveryDetails: Joi.object(),</br>
    }),
    paymentType: Joi.string().valid(["POD", "paidOnline", "card"]).required(),</br>
    cardToken: Joi.when("paymentType", {
      is: "card",
      then: Joi.string().required(),
      otherwise: Joi.string(),
    }),</br>
    taxes: Joi.object().required(),</br>
    taxesPercent: Joi.object().required(),</br>
    deliveryCharges: Joi.number().required(),</br>
    driverAmount: Joi.number(),</br>
    deliveryInstructions: Joi.string().allow(""),
    cardDetails: Joi.object(),</br>

details: Joi.object({
senderName: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderMobile: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderEmail: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      senderCountryCode: Joi.string().required(),</br>
  recipientName: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      recipientMobile: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      recipientEmail: Joi.string(),</br>
      recipientCountryCode: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      itemPicture: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      pickUpLoction: Joi.array().required(),</br>
      pickUpAddress: Joi.object().required(),</br>
      dropLoction: Joi.array().required(),</br>
      dropAddress: Joi.object().required(),</br>
      deliveryTime: Joi.number(),</br>
      deliveryDateTime: Joi.string(),</br>
      otherDeliveryDetails: Joi.object(),</br>
    }),
    paymentType: Joi.string().valid(["POD", "paidOnline", "card"]).required(),</br>
    cardToken: Joi.when("paymentType", {
      is: "card",
      then: Joi.string().required(),
      otherwise: Joi.string(),
    }),</br>
    taxes: Joi.object().required(),</br>
    taxesPercent: Joi.object().required(),</br>
    deliveryCharges: Joi.number().required(),</br>
    driverAmount: Joi.number(),</br>
    deliveryInstructions: Joi.string().allow(""),
    cardDetails: Joi.object(),</br>

driver will add and update bank account details in this api:</br> 
    isPaymentGatewayIntegrated: Joi.boolean().required(),</br>
    accountBank: Joi.when("isPaymentGatewayIntegrated", {
      is: false,
      then: Joi.string().required(),
      otherwise: Joi.string(),
    }),</br>
    accountNumber: Joi.when("isPaymentGatewayIntegrated", {
      is: false,
      then: Joi.string().required(),
      otherwise: Joi.string().required(),
    }),</br>
    countryAbbrevation: Joi.when("isPaymentGatewayIntegrated", {
      is: false,
      then: Joi.string().required(),
      otherwise: Joi.string(),
    }),</br>
    name: Joi.string(),</br>

    metaData: Joi.array(),</br>

firstName: Joi.string().max(200).required(),</br>
    lastName: Joi.string().max(200),</br>
    email: Joi.string().email(),</br>
    mobile: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    licenseFrontImage: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    licenseBackImage: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    vehicleRegistrationFront: Joi.string().required(),</br>
    vehicleRegistrationBack: Joi.string().allow(""),</br>
    driverLicenseExpiryDate: Joi.string(),</br>
    vehicleExpiryDate: Joi.string(),</br>
driverLicenseExpiryEpoch: Joi.number(),</br>
    vehicleExpiryEpoch: Joi.number(),</br>
    vehicleNumber: Joi.string(),</br>
    vehicleModel: Joi.string(),</br>
    vehicleType: Joi.string(),</br>
    otherDocuments: Joi.array().allow([]),</br>
    countryCode: Joi.string(),</br>
    address: Joi.object({
      currentAddress: Joi.string().required(),</br>
      completeAddress: Joi.string(),
      zipcode: Joi.string().allow(""),
    }),
    gender: Joi.string().valid("male", "female", "other"),</br>
    dateOfBirth: Joi.string(),</br>

    location: Joi.array().required(),</br>
    deviceToken: Joi.string().min(1).max(200),</br>
    otpToken: Joi.number().required(),</br>
    profilePic: Joi.string(),</br>
